name: Escape From Uncle Josh
description:
This is a short 5-10 minute horror game starring Uncle Josh, a ripped bodybuilder who has discovered that humans are a great source of protein. Escape before you end up as a supplement in his pre-workout.

This game was made by Daniel Fuerlinger for the final project of CS425 at George Mason University.

Controls:

Use the WASD keys to move, and use the mouse to point the camera.

ESC key to make the window lose focus.

Close the game at any time by clicking the 'x'. 

Beating the game will close the window automatically.

Additional note:

The game does not currently support fullscreen, audio adjustment, or key remapping.
